TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpCacheVaryByHeaders extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供一种类型安全的方式来设置 属性。

span.span: Provides a type-safe way to set the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识当某个资源有多个缓存响应时，ASP.NET 使用哪个请求标头参数来唯一标识响应的变体。The property identifies which request header parameters ASP.NET uses to uniquely identify a variation of the response when there are multiple cached responses for a resource. 当响应依赖于一组客户端输入（如标头或参数）时，这非常有用。This is useful when a response depends on a set of client inputs, such as headers or parameters. 与 HTTP 缓存控制标头不直接相关，但可帮助确保客户端或代理因指定的标头而异。The is not directly related to HTTP cache-control headers, but helps ensure that a client or proxy varies by the specified headers. 有关的详细信息 `VaryByHeaders` ，请参阅 [万维网联合会 (W3C) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)网站上的 RFC 2616：超文本传输协议-HTTP/1.1。For more information about `VaryByHeaders`, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 有关完整的详细信息，请参阅第14节 "标头字段定义"。See section 14, "Header Field Definitions", for complete details.

span.span: Caching Multiple Versions of a Page

related.span: 如何：基于 HTTP 头缓存页面版本

span.span: How to: Cache Versions of a Page, Based on HTTP Headers

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 ASP.NET 输出缓存是否随 HTTP 标头而改变缓存的响应，并将该标头追加到传出的 HTTP 标头。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ASP.NET output cache varies the cached responses by the HTTP header, and appends it to the out-going HTTP header.

value.span: 当 ASP.NET 输出缓存随 标头而改变时，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: when the ASP.NET output cache varies by the header; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Vary`标头指示服务器通过字段改变响应的请求标头字段 `Accept` ，并指定服务器根据客户端可接受的媒体类型选择响应。The `Vary` header indicates the request-header fields that the server varies the response by the `Accept` field and specifies that the server selects the response based on the media types acceptable to the client. 有关 HTTP 标头的详细信息，请参阅 [万维网联合会 (W3C) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)网站上提供的 RFC 2616：超文本传输协议-HTTP/1.1。For more information on HTTP headers, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 有关完整的详细信息，请参阅第14节 "标头字段定义"。See section 14, "Header Field Definitions", for complete details. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了仅当属性为时，才执行某些操作 `true` 。This following code example demonstrates how some action is performed only if the property is `true`. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.AcceptTypes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.AcceptTypes Example/cs/source.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.AcceptTypes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.AcceptTypes Example/vb/source.aspx#1)]

span.span: The name of the custom header.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个自定义标头字段，ASP.NET 输出缓存将随该字段改变缓存的响应，并将其追加到传出的 HTTP 标头。

span.span: Gets or sets a custom header field that the ASP.NET output cache varies the cached responses by, and appends it to the out-going HTTP header.

value.span: 当 ASP.NET 输出缓存因指定的自定义字段而异时;否则为 。

span.span: when the ASP.NET output cache varies by the specified custom field; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Vary`标头指示服务器根据其变化的请求标头字段。The `Vary` header indicates the request-header fields that the server varies the response by. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [万维网联合会 (W3C) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)网站上的 RFC 2616：超文本传输协议-HTTP/1.1。For more information, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 有关完整的详细信息，请参阅第14节 "标头字段定义"。See section 14, "Header Field Definitions", for complete details. 如果指定的 `header` 具有值 \* (星号) ，则将在内部调用方法。The method is called internally if the specified `header` has the value \* (an asterisk).

span.span: is .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 ASP.NET 输出缓存是否随 标头改变缓存的响应，并将该标头追加到传出的 HTTP 标头。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ASP.NET output cache varies the cached responses by the header, and appends it to the out-going HTTP header.

value.span: 当 ASP.NET 输出缓存随 标头而变化并将该标头添加到被发送到客户端的 HTTP 标头时，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: when the ASP.NET output cache varies by the header, and adds it to the HTTP header sent to the client; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Vary`标头指示请求标头字段，该字段用于确定为响应客户端请求而发送了多个缓存的响应。The `Vary` header indicates the request-header fields that the server uses to determine which of multiple cached responses is sent in response to a client request. `User-Agent`字段指定服务器基于客户端的用户代理类型选择响应。The `User-Agent` field specifies that the server selects the response based on the client's user-agent type. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [万维网联合会 (W3C) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)网站上的 RFC 2616：超文本传输协议-HTTP/1.1。For more information, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 有关完整的详细信息，请参阅第14节 "标头字段定义"。See section 14, "Header Field Definitions", for complete details. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了仅当属性为时，才执行某些操作 `true` 。The following code example demonstrates how some action is performed only if the property is `true`. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserAgent Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserAgent Example/cs/source.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserAgent Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserAgent Example/vb/source.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 ASP.NET 输出缓存是否随 标头改变缓存的响应，并将该标头追加到传出的 HTTP 标头。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ASP.NET output cache varies the cached responses by the header, and appends it to the out-going HTTP header.

value.span: 当 ASP.NET 输出缓存随 标头而变化并将该标头添加到被发送到客户端的 HTTP 标头时，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: when the ASP.NET output cache varies by the header and adds it to the HTTP header sent to the client; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Vary`标头指示请求标头字段，该字段用于确定为响应客户端请求而发送了多个缓存的响应。The `Vary` header indicates the request-header fields that the server uses to determine which of multiple cached responses is sent in response to a client request. `Accept-CharSet`字段指定服务器基于客户端的字符集选择响应。The `Accept-CharSet` field specifies that the server selects the response based on the client's character set. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [万维网联合会 (W3C) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)网站上的 RFC 2616：超文本传输协议-HTTP/1.1。For more information, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 有关完整的详细信息，请参阅第14节 "标头字段定义"。See section 14, "Header Field Definitions", for complete details. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了仅当属性为时，才执行某些操作 `true` 。The following code example demonstrates how some action is performed only if the property is `true`. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserCharSet Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserCharSet Example/cs/source.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserCharSet Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserCharSet Example/vb/source.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 ASP.NET 输出缓存是否随 标头改变缓存的响应，并将该标头追加到传出的 HTTP 标头。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ASP.NET output cache varies the cached responses by the header, and appends it to the out-going HTTP header.

value.span: 当 ASP.NET 输出缓存随 标头而变化并将该标头添加到被发送到客户端的 HTTP 标头时，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Vary`标头指示请求标头字段，该字段用于确定为响应客户端请求而发送了多个缓存的响应。The `Vary` header indicates the request-header fields that the server uses to determine which of multiple cached responses is sent in response to a client request. `Accept-Language`字段指定服务器根据客户端可接受的语言选择响应。The `Accept-Language` field specifies that the server selects the response based on languages acceptable to the client. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [万维网联合会 (W3C) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)网站上的 RFC 2616：超文本传输协议-HTTP/1.1。For more information, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 有关完整的详细信息，请参阅第14节 "标头字段定义"。See section 14, "Header Field Definitions", for complete details. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了仅当属性为时，才执行某些操作 `true` 。The following code example demonstrates how some action is performed only if the property is `true`. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserLanguage Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserLanguage Example/cs/source.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserLanguage Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserLanguage Example/vb/source.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void VaryByUnspecifiedParameters() cil managed

summary.span: 导致 ASP.NET 随所有标头值而变化，并将 HTTP 标头设置为值 \*（星号）。

span.span: Causes ASP.NET to vary by all header values and sets the HTTP header to the value \* (an asterisk).

summary.span: 所有其他 标头信息将被丢弃。

span.span: All other header information to be dropped.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Vary`标头指示请求标头字段，该字段用于确定为响应客户端请求而发送了多个缓存的响应。The `Vary` header indicates the request-header fields that the server uses to determine which of multiple cached responses is sent in response to a client request. \* 值指定服务器基于 "请求标头" 中未指定的参数（例如，客户端) 的网络地址）选择响应 (。The \* value specifies that the server selects the response based on parameters not specified in request headers (for example, the network address of the client). 有关详细信息，请参阅 [万维网联合会 (W3C) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)网站上的 RFC 2616：超文本传输协议-HTTP/1.1。For more information, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 有关完整的详细信息，请参阅第14节 "标头字段定义"。See section 14, "Header Field Definitions", for complete details.
